props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies the content of the `Stepper`.

description.text: Specifies the content of the `Stepper`.

props.name: activeKey
props.docblock: The eventKey of the step to display.

description.text: The eventKey of the step to display.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies the content of the `ActionRow`.

description.text: Specifies the content of the `ActionRow`.

props.name: eventKey
props.docblock:
An identifier of the `ActionRow`. When `activeKey` on the
`Stepper` equals to the `eventKey`, the `ActionRow` will be displayed.

description.text:
An identifier of the `ActionRow`. When `activeKey` on the
`Stepper` equals to the `eventKey`, the `ActionRow` will be displayed.

props.name: as
props.docblock: Specifies the base element

description.text: Specifies the base element

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: PageCountComponent
props.docblock: A component that receives `activeStepIndex` and `totalSteps` props to display them.

description.text: A component that receives `activeStepIndex` and `totalSteps` props to display them.

props.name: compactWidth
props.docblock:
The max width in which the compact view of the header will switch to display the step number that is
currently in progress. Options include 'xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl', and 'xxl'.

description.text:
The max width in which the compact view of the header will switch to display the step number that is
currently in progress. Options include 'xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl', and 'xxl'.

props.name: index
props.docblock: A number that will be display in the icon of the `HeaderStep`.

description.text: A number that will be display in the icon of the `HeaderStep`.

props.name: title
props.docblock: A text of the `HeaderStep`.

description.text: A text of the `HeaderStep`.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock: Specifies that this `HeaderStep` is active.

description.text: Specifies that this `HeaderStep` is active.

props.name: hasError
props.docblock: Informs user if this `Step` has errors.

description.text: Informs user if this `Step` has errors.

props.name: description
props.docblock: A text under the `title`.

description.text: A text under the `title`.

props.name: onClick
props.docblock: Callback fired when element gets clicked.

description.text: Callback fired when element gets clicked.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies the content of the `Step`.

description.text: Specifies the content of the `Step`.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element

props.name: eventKey
props.docblock:
An identifier of the `Step`. When `activeKey` on the
`Stepper` equals to the `eventKey`, the `Step` will be displayed.

description.text:
An identifier of the `Step`. When `activeKey` on the
`Stepper` equals to the `eventKey`, the `Step` will be displayed.

props.name: title
props.docblock: A text of the `Step`.

description.text: A text of the `Step`.

props.name: description
props.docblock: A text under the `title`.

description.text: A text under the `title`.

props.name: hasError
props.docblock: Informs user if this `Step` has errors.

description.text: Informs user if this `Step` has errors.

props.name: index
props.docblock:
Position of the `Step`, only required if adding error state
or conditionally rendering steps.

description.text:
Position of the `Step`, only required if adding error state
or conditionally rendering steps.

props.name: onClick
props.docblock:
Click handler for the `Step`. Takes effect only after the `Step` has been visited, making it clickable
and invoking this function on click. Should be used to provide navigation between steps.

description.text:
Click handler for the `Step`. Takes effect only after the `Step` has been visited, making it clickable
and invoking this function on click. Should be used to provide navigation between steps.
